title: WE ARE
lyrics:
Yuh ulin dallyeo sigan-i akkawo
Gomin ttawin eobs-eo Keep goin’on
Neowa naega son-eul maju jab-eul ttae
Kkeojiji anh-a i bulbich-eun
Look at me now ttalawa bwa

We run for the throne and we got this

I don’t wanna play the game

Ijeneun gaya hae Oh Ah



Seololeul mid-eul ttae hanaga dwae

Nae binson-e geomeojwin gihoe

Get out of my way jichil ttaen

Neohui deung-eul bomyeo ttalagalge

Uli mamsog-ui kkum-eul dasi kkaewo

Bul-anham ttawineun tteolchyeo beolyeo

Gidaehae ulil wihan hamseong-i

Naleul il-eukyeo ssod-anae eneoji



Byeolang kkeut-e naemollineun

Sungan-edo beotyeo We’ll be goin’ up

Deo meon gos-eul balabwa Get your hands on

Dol-agal gos-eun deo isang eobs-eo

Ulin apman bogo ga



WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

Uliga gaya hal gil-inikka

WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

That’s the way WE ARE WE ARE



Geobmeogji malgo ma-eum dandanhi meog-eo

Jasingam ppaemyeon sicheya Yah Yah namjadabge

Look at me now ttalawa bwa

We run for the throne and we got this

We don’t need to play the game

Huhoeneun eobs-eo Let’s get it on



Neukkim issge Go on kkalkkeumhage Throw it up

Milyeon ttawin Stay off You nah mean

Sungan-ui aswium singyeong sseuji ma

Meoli apa eojileowo

Geulae uli uli ulin

Jeulgineun bangbeob-eul aljanh-a ulin

Geulae neohui neohui neohuin

Eonjena jikyeobwa jul geoya ulil



Byeolang kkeut-e naemollineun

Sungan-edo beotyeo We’ll be goin’ up

Deo meon gos-eul balabwa Get your hands on

Dol-agal gos-eun deo isang eobs-eo

Ulin apman bogo ga



WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

Uliga gaya hal gil-inikka

WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

That’s the way WE ARE WE ARE



Cheoncheonhi sum-eul deul-ikyeo simjang solil deul-eobwa

Jogeubhaehaji ma

Don’t give up Don’t give up

Don’t lean on Don’t lean on me

Nolyeoghae nolyeoghae ulin seuseulo

Make it Make it

Bigyohaji ma



WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

Uliga gaya hal gil-inikka

WE ARE WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE ARE

That’s the way WE ARE WE ARE

Drop that



WE ARE WE ARE

That’s the way WE ARE

That’s the way WE ARE

Ulideulman-ui bangsig

That’s the way WE ARE WE ARE

WE ARE WE ARE
